Class StreamMessenger

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.Messenger
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.StreamMessenger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class StreamMessenger extends Messenger
A StreamMessenger is a class which can poll a field controller and get the response using a TCP socket connection.
Author:
Douglas Lau, John L. Stanley - SRF Consulting

  • Method Details

    • create

      protected static StreamMessenger create(URI u, int rt, int ct, int nrd) throws MessengerException, IOException
      Create a TCP stream messenger.
      Parameters:
      u - URI of remote host.
      rt - Receive timeout (ms).
      ct - Connect timeout (ms).
      nrd - No-response disconnect (sec).
      Throws:
      MessengerException
      IOException

    • getRawInputStream

      protected InputStream getRawInputStream(String path)
      Get the input stream.
      Parameters:
      path - Relative path name.
      Returns:
      An input stream for reading from the messenger.
